title: EU to set up special migrant reception centres by November: Tusk
content:
The EU will set up special reception centres for migrants in frontline states by the end of November, the bloc’s President Donald Tusk said Thursday after an emergency summit of European leaders.  
Brussels (AFP) | 23 September 2015 23:30 

“‘Hotspots’ will be set up by the end of November,” Tusk said, without referring to planned registration centres that the EU says will speed up efforts to sort genuine conflict refugees from economic migrants. 
 
© 2015 AFP
